text: 26.59-60 Lo 19.15, Sng 27.12, Mak 14.55, Apo 6.13 Bɨ God nop sɨbogep bɨawl okok sek, bɨ Juda bɨawl takaw tɨg asɨkep okok mɨdupsek kɨli agɨlak, Chɨn bɨ takaw yepɨs agɨnɨgel ogɨnap kɨlop agnɨgon, kɨli apɨl takaw olap agel, chɨn nɨŋɨd, nɨŋɨd apɨm agɨl, Jisas nop paklɨnɨgun agɨlak. Anɨb agɨlak ak pen, takaw anɨb ak keke amek jɨj nɨŋɨd nop paklɨnɨgel tek olap ma yek. Kɨdek pen bɨ omɨŋal apɨl
